mapper.insert: insert into meeting (meetingname, roomid, reservationistid, numberofparticipants, starttime, endtime, reservationtime, canceledtime, description, status) values (#{meetingname}, #{roomid}, #{reservationistid}, #{numberofparticipants}, #{starttime}, #{endtime}, #{reservationtime}, #{canceledtime}, #{description}, #{status})
mapper.select:
SELECT m.*, mr.roomname, e.employeename as reservername FROM meeting m LEFT JOIN meetingroom mr ON m.roomid = mr.roomid LEFT JOIN employee e ON m.reservationistid = e.employeeid
ORDER BY m.reservationtime DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM meeting m LEFT JOIN meetingroom mr ON m.roomid = mr.roomid LEFT JOIN employee e ON m.reservationistid = e.employeeid

SELECT m.*, mr.roomname, e.employeename as reservername FROM meeting m LEFT JOIN meetingroom mr ON m.roomid = mr.roomid LEFT JOIN employee e ON m.reservationistid = e.employeeid WHERE m.meetingid = #{meetingId}

SELECT m.meetingid, m.meetingname, mr.roomname, m.starttime, m.endtime, m.reservationtime, e.employeename AS reservername FROM meetingparticipants mp INNER JOIN meeting m ON mp.meetingid = m.meetingid LEFT JOIN meetingroom mr ON m.roomid = mr.roomid LEFT JOIN employee e ON m.reservationistid = e.employeeid WHERE mp.employeeid = #{id} and m.status = '0' ORDER BY m.starttime DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}
select count(distinct mp.meetingid) from meetingparticipants mp left join meeting m on mp.meetingid = m.meetingid where mp.employeeid = #{id} and m.status = '0'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM meeting WHERE reservationistid = #{id} and status != '3'

SELECT m.meetingid, m.meetingname, mr.roomname, m.starttime, m.endtime, m.reservationtime FROM meeting m LEFT JOIN meetingroom mr ON m.roomid = mr.roomid WHERE m.reservationistid = #{id} and m.status != '3' ORDER BY m.starttime DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}
